Uses of Package
net.minecraftforge.event.entity.player

  • Packages that use net.minecraftforge.event.entity.player 
    Package Description
    net.minecraftforge.client.event  
    net.minecraftforge.common  
    net.minecraftforge.debug.entity.player  
    net.minecraftforge.debug.misc  
    net.minecraftforge.event  
    net.minecraftforge.event.brewing  
    net.minecraftforge.event.entity.player  
  • Classes in net.minecraftforge.event.entity.player used by net.minecraftforge.client.event 
    Class and Description
    PlayerEvent
    PlayerEvent is fired whenever an event involving Living entities occurs.
  • Classes in net.minecraftforge.event.entity.player used by net.minecraftforge.common 
    Class and Description
    CriticalHitEvent
    This event is fired whenever a player attacks an Entity in EntityPlayer#attackTargetEntityWithCurrentItem(Entity).

    This event is not Cancelable.

    This event has a result.
    PlayerEvent.PlayerChangedDimensionEvent 
    PlayerEvent.PlayerLoggedInEvent 
    PlayerInteractEvent.LeftClickBlock
    This event is fired when a player left clicks while targeting a block.
    PlayerInteractEvent.RightClickBlock
    This event is fired on both sides whenever the player right clicks while targeting a block.
  • Classes in net.minecraftforge.event.entity.player used by net.minecraftforge.debug.entity.player 
    Class and Description
    PlayerEvent.NameFormat
    NameFormat is fired when a player's display name is retrieved.
    This event is fired whenever a player's name is retrieved in PlayerEntity.getDisplayName() for the first time or if PlayerEntity.refreshDisplayName() is called.

    This event is fired via ForgeEventFactory.getPlayerDisplayName(PlayerEntity, String) or ForgeEventFactory.getPlayerDisplayName(PlayerEntity, ITextComponent).

    PlayerEvent.NameFormat.username contains the username of the player.
    PlayerXpEvent
    PlayerXpEvent is fired whenever an event involving player experience occurs.
    PlayerXpEvent.LevelChange
    This event is fired when the player's experience level changes through the PlayerEntity.addExperienceLevel(int) method.
    PlayerXpEvent.PickupXp
    This event is fired after the player collides with an experience orb, but before the player has been given the experience.
    PlayerXpEvent.XpChange
    This event is fired when the player's experience changes through the PlayerEntity.giveExperiencePoints(int) method.
  • Classes in net.minecraftforge.event.entity.player used by net.minecraftforge.debug.misc 
    Class and Description
    PlayerInteractEvent.RightClickBlock
    This event is fired on both sides whenever the player right clicks while targeting a block.
  • Classes in net.minecraftforge.event.entity.player used by net.minecraftforge.event 
    Class and Description
    ItemTooltipEvent 
  • Classes in net.minecraftforge.event.entity.player used by net.minecraftforge.event.brewing 
    Class and Description
    PlayerEvent
    PlayerEvent is fired whenever an event involving Living entities occurs.
  • Classes in net.minecraftforge.event.entity.player used by net.minecraftforge.event.entity.player 
    Class and Description
    PlayerContainerEvent 
    PlayerEvent
    PlayerEvent is fired whenever an event involving Living entities occurs.
    PlayerInteractEvent
    PlayerInteractEvent is fired when a player interacts in some way.
    PlayerXpEvent
    PlayerXpEvent is fired whenever an event involving player experience occurs.
